info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 5:28PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Stillwater, west central Yellowstone and southeastern Golden Valley Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 527 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles southeast of Ryegate to 7 miles west of Billings West End. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail and torrential rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Broadview, Molt, Comanche and Acton. This advisory does not include the city of Billings. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
